list.title: AllowedValues
list.description: Represents the allowed values for a field.

list.title: DataCaptureThread
list.description: Private constructor. Use the make() method for creating new instances of DCTs.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#config
list.description: The Data Capture Thread config.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#dps
list.description: Data Per Second metrics.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#getConfig
list.description: Returns the DCT config as stored on the instance. If a schema is provided, any properties missing from the schema will be dropped from the returned object. Any properties missing from the config and present on the schema will be returned with their default values as defined by the schema.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#getMetadata
list.description: Shorthand method for returning the properties stored on the STREAM_CONFIG_METADATA config key. Depending on the DCT implementation, this metadata can describe how the data is provided for the pipeline. One such example could be the resolution of the extracted video frames that are fed into the computer vision pipelines.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#isDirty
list.description: Signals syncronization on network node.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#schema
list.description: The config schema used for validation.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#setStats
list.description: Sets the statistics for this capture thread, as received from heartbeat.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#stats
list.description: Stats.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#time
list.description: Time.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#updateConfig
list.description:
Updates the config values of a DCT. The update is validated against the stored schema, if the validation fails the errors are thrown.

When updating, the DCT instance will be marked as dirty in order to be synchronized with the edge node by the node manager handling the communication.

list.title: DataCaptureThread#updateMetadata
list.description: Shorthand method for updating the DCT metadata stored on the STREAM_CONFIG_METADATA config key.

list.title: DataCaptureThread.make
list.description:
Static factory to instantiate DataCaptureThreads.

When called, will attempt to validate the config against the schema. Any errors will be thrown. This method is used both internally, when loading pipeline configurations from the heartbeat info, and when creating new pipelines to be deployed on the network node.

list.title: Field
list.description: Represents a field in the configuration.

list.title: InternalStateManager
list.description: The InternalStateManager constructor.

list.title: InternalStateManager#broadcastIgnoreRequestId
list.description: Signals the registered threads to remove the watch for a specific session id.

list.title: InternalStateManager#broadcastRequestId
list.description: Broadcasts interest for a specific session id to all the registered threads. The session id will be used for correct routing of the received notifications from the network.

list.title: InternalStateManager#broadcastUpdateFleet
list.description: Broadcasts working fleet to all registered threads.

list.title: InternalStateManager#getNetworkSnapshot
list.description: Returns the network information as received from the supervisors.

list.title: InternalStateManager#getNetworkSupervisors
list.description: Get the list of observed network supervisors.

list.title: InternalStateManager#getNodeInfo
list.description: Returns the processed heartbeat cached for a specific address.

list.title: InternalStateManager#getUniverse
list.description: Returns the list of all observed network nodes. An observed node is any of the nodes that published a payload, notification or heartbeat, which was intercepted by the worker threads, even if that message was discarded because it was not from the controlled working fleet.

list.title: InternalStateManager#logger
list.description: Logger handler.

list.title: InternalStateManager#markNodeAsSeen
list.description: Will mark a specific node as seen in the dictionary of nodes.

list.title: InternalStateManager#nodeInfoUpdate
list.description: Stores the processed heartbeat data into the in-memory storage.

list.title: InternalStateManager#registerThread
list.description: Registers a worker thread handler for enabling communication from the StateManager towards the thread.

list.title: InternalStateManager#state
list.description:
The internal state to be stored and updated by this instance. The state property will hold:

  • heartbeat information to be passed to worker threads for context
  • other observed nodes (not registered in the working fleet)
  • pending transactions (updates communicated to the node without any responses)
  • network status as provided by the network supervisor

list.title: InternalStateManager#threads
list.description: Handlers for the message processing threads.

list.title: InternalStateManager#updateNetworkSnapshot
list.description: Will store the network snapshot as seen from a specific supervisor node.

list.title: IntervalDefinition
list.description: Represents the configuration for an interval.

list.title: IsObject
list.description: Helper function that tests if a specific value is an Object.

list.title: Logger
list.description:
The Logger constructor.

Accepts the log level to output.

list.title: Logger#_print
list.description: Internal method that formats and outputs the logged message.

list.title: Logger#debug
list.description: Shorthand method for printing a debug level log entry.

list.title: Logger#error
list.description: Shorthand method for printing a critical error level log entry.

list.title: Logger#getLevel
list.description: Returns the currently configured logging level.

list.title: Logger#log
list.description: Shorthand method for printing a normal level log entry.

list.title: Logger#setLevel
list.description: Allows to set for a specific log level.

list.title: Logger#type
list.description: Flag for identifying this logger throughout the SDK.

list.title: Logger#warn
list.description: Shorthand method for printing an error or warning level log entry.

list.title: Naeural
list.description: The network client constructor.

list.title: Naeural#_checkNode
list.description: Private method for checking if a specified address is in the controlled fleet or if it's heartbeat has been witnessed.

list.title: Naeural#_onStateMessage
list.description: Factory method for attaching callbacks on state messages.

list.title: Naeural#_onThreadMessage
list.description: Internal method for processing messages received from the worker threads.

list.title: Naeural#alertedNodes
list.description: Dictionary of all alerted nodes.

list.title: Naeural#boot
list.description: This method connects the client to the network and spawns all the threads on the network streams.

list.title: Naeural#bootOptions
list.description: The boot options.

list.title: Naeural#checkBootComplete
list.description: Internal method for compiling the boot status for the subordinated worker threads.

list.title: Naeural#deregisterEdgeNode
list.description: TODO: async Method for deregistering a network node without rebooting the client.

list.title: Naeural#getBlockChainAddress
list.description: This method returns the NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network unique blockchain address.

list.title: Naeural#getDCTSchema
list.description: Returns the schema associated to a DCT name.

list.title: Naeural#getFleet
list.description: Method for retrieving the status of the fleet of network nodes that are processed by this instance.

list.title: Naeural#getMemoryStats
list.description: Returns the snapshot of the memory usage.

list.title: Naeural#getName
list.description: This method returns the initiator name used for the connection.

list.title: Naeural#getNetworkStatus
list.description: Returns the current network status as seen by the specified supervisor. If supervisor is null, it returns the latest information received.

list.title: Naeural#getNodeManager
list.description: Returns a NodeManager for a specific node/address.

list.title: Naeural#getPluginSchema
list.description: Returns the loaded schema for a specific plugin signature.

list.title: Naeural#getRegisteredDCTTypes
list.description: Returns a list of all the registered DCT Schemas.

list.title: Naeural#getRegisteredPluginTypes
list.description: Returns the list of Plugin Schemas associated to this network client.

list.title: Naeural#getStream
list.description: Returns a specific stream of events in the network. It can offer a window inside all the messages published in a specific message type category.

list.title: Naeural#getSupervisors
list.description: Get the list of network supervisors.

list.title: Naeural#getUniverse
list.description: Returns the client's observable universe: all the hosts that sent a heartbeat that are outside this client's fleet.

list.title: Naeural#instanceCallbacks
list.description: Dictionary of instance callbacks, indexed by NEN name and instance id.

list.title: Naeural#logger
list.description: Reference to the logger to use.

list.title: Naeural#markThreadStatus
list.description: Internal method for keeping track of worker threads statuses.

list.title: Naeural#memoryUsageStats
list.description: Statistics about the memory used by the SDK.

list.title: Naeural#mqttClient
list.description: The network connection.

list.title: Naeural#naeuralBC
list.description: Internal reference to the Blockchain Engine

list.title: Naeural#networkStreams
list.description: Internal dictionary keeping references to the streams of events received from the child threads.

list.title: Naeural#publish
list.description: Method for publishing a message for an NaeuralEdgeProtocol Node.

list.title: Naeural#registerDCTType
list.description: Allows for hot registration of a new DCT Schema to be used by the network client.

list.title: Naeural#registerEdgeNode
list.description: TODO: async Method for registering a new network node without rebooting the client.

list.title: Naeural#registerPluginSchema
list.description: Associates a schema with a plugin signature.

list.title: Naeural#schemas
list.description: The repository of schemas to be used when interacting with instances and pipelines.

list.title: Naeural#setInstanceCallback
list.description: Sets a custom callback for a specific instance.

list.title: Naeural#state
list.description: The state to update.

list.title: Naeural#threads
list.description: Internal dictionary keeping references to child threads.

list.title: Naeural#topicPaths
list.description: Dictionary describing the network topics to listen to.

list.title: Naeural#universeAddresses
list.description: A dictionary with network addresses associated to node names.

list.title: NaeuralBC
list.description: NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network Blockchain engine constructor.

list.title: NaeuralBC#_getHash
list.description: Returns the hash for a provided input. Inputs can be either a string or an object. Any other datatype will throw an error.

list.title: NaeuralBC#_prepareMessage
list.description: Generates and applies all the signatures and hashes to the input object. The format can be either json or object and it allows the caller to select the format of the returned value.

list.title: NaeuralBC#_signHash
list.description: Generates the signature for the provided hash.

list.title: NaeuralBC#compressedPublicKey
list.description: A handy cache for the public key.

list.title: NaeuralBC#debugMode
list.description: Flag to boot the engine in debug mode. Will output signature verification logs.

list.title: NaeuralBC#getAddress
list.description: Returns the NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network blockchain address.

list.title: NaeuralBC#getPublicKeyDER
list.description: Returns the public key as a string.

list.title: NaeuralBC#keyPair
list.description: The keypair that is in use.

list.title: NaeuralBC#sign
list.description: Returns the signed input object with all the cryptographical metadata appended to it. The format can be either json or object and it allows the caller to select the format of the returned value.

list.title: NaeuralBC#verify
list.description: Verifies the message signature. If the message is incorrectly signed, will return false.

list.title: NaeuralBC._removeAddressPrefix
list.description: Removes the prefix from the address.

list.title: NaeuralBC.generateKeys
list.description: Generates a pair of public-private keys that can be used throughout this module or when interacting with the network.

list.title: NaeuralEvent
list.description: Enum NaeuralEdgeProtocol Client Events

list.title: NaeuralEventType
list.description: Enum NaeuralEdgeProtocol Event Stream Types

list.title: NetworkRequest
list.description: The NetworkRequest constructor.

list.title: NetworkRequest#canResolve
list.description: Returns true if all the transaction targets were hit and the responses are all successful.

list.title: NetworkRequest#clearCompletionTimeout
list.description: Clears the timeout for the resolving of the transaction.

list.title: NetworkRequest#clearFirstResponseTimeout
list.description: Clears the timeout for the first network response.

list.title: NetworkRequest#close
list.description: Closes the transaction and removes the completion timeout.

list.title: NetworkRequest#closed
list.description: Request status.

list.title: NetworkRequest#getId
list.description: Returns the transaction id.

list.title: NetworkRequest#id
list.description: Network request id.

list.title: NetworkRequest#isClosed
list.description: Returns the status of the transaction.

list.title: NetworkRequest#isComplete
list.description: Returns true if all the transaction targets were hit. The completion status concerns only if all the expected notifications were received, it doesn't offer information about the success of the request.

list.title: NetworkRequest#listWatches
list.description: Returns all the notification paths watched by the current transaction.

list.title: NetworkRequest#nodeRequestsHandler
list.description: Reference to the network request handler that keeps track of all the open requests.

list.title: NetworkRequest#onFail
list.description: Fail callback.

list.title: NetworkRequest#onSuccess
list.description: Success callback.

list.title: NetworkRequest#process
list.description: Main processing function. All notifications should be routed through this method. When first notification is received, the timeout for the first response is cleared.

list.title: NetworkRequest#reject
list.description: Attempt to reject the transaction.

list.title: NetworkRequest#resolve
list.description: Attempt to resolve the transaction.

list.title: NetworkRequest#setProcessingStrategy
list.description: Loads a solving strategy for the current transaction.

list.title: NetworkRequest#setTimeoutIds
list.description:
Sets the timeout ids for the two timeout callbacks.

  • firstResponseTimeoutId is the callback id for the timer waiting for the first network response
  • completionTimeoutId is the callback id for the timer keeping track of the successful completion of the whole transaction.

list.title: NetworkRequest#strategy
list.description: The strategy to use when interpreting the stream of received notifications.

list.title: NetworkRequest#targets
list.description: A dictionary of targets to track when processing responses. It allows for correctly interpreting the flow of notifications received from the nodes.

list.title: NetworkRequest#timeout
list.description: Trigger the timeout on the transaction.

list.title: NetworkRequest#timeoutIds
list.description: Handlers for the timeouts.

list.title: NetworkRequest#transactionNotifications
list.description: A temporary storage for all the incoming notifications. Will be bubbled upwards when resolving the promise.

list.title: NetworkRequest#updateTarget
list.description: Pushes a notification onto the list of notifications linked to a specific target path.

list.title: NetworkRequest#watch
list.description: Registers a notification path to track when resolving the transaction.

list.title: NetworkRequest#watches
list.description: Returns true if the current transaction is keeping track of a specific notification path.

list.title: NetworkRequestsHandler#createRequest
list.description: Creates a new transaction handling the message publishing for a network node.

list.title: NetworkRequestsHandler#destroy
list.description: Cleans up the transaction handler related to the supplied path.

list.title: NetworkRequestsHandler#find
list.description: Retrieves the transaction handler watching for the supplied path.

list.title: NetworkRequestsHandler#index
list.description: Indexes the transaction request by the specified notification path to watch for.

list.title: NetworkRequestsHandler#pendingRequests
list.description: The list of open transactions.

list.title: NetworkRequestsHandler#requestsIndexes
list.description: The list of object transactions indexed by the notification paths targeted.

list.title: NodeManager
list.description: The NodeManager constructor.

list.title: NodeManager#_getRunningPipelines
list.description: Returns the pipelines running on this node as they're reflected by the last received heartbeat.

list.title: NodeManager#attachPluginInstance
list.description: Adds a new Plugin Instance to be deployed on the Pipeline.

list.title: NodeManager#client
list.description: The network client reference.

list.title: NodeManager#closePipeline
list.description: Closes the pipeline by queueing an Archive Config command for the NaeuralEdgeProtocol node.

list.title: NodeManager#commit
list.description: Commits the changes registered for the node.

list.title: NodeManager#createPipeline
list.description: Creates a pipeline on the managed node.

list.title: NodeManager#createPluginInstance
list.description: Method for creating a PluginInstance of a specific signature with the provided config. If no name is provided a generated name will be assigned.

list.title: NodeManager#getFullHeartbeatFromEdgeNode
list.description: Sends a request for a detailed heartbeat to the node.

list.title: NodeManager#getHardwareStats
list.description: Sends a request for the node hardware stats history.

list.title: NodeManager#getHeartbeatFromEdgeNode
list.description: Sends a heartbeat request to the node.

list.title: NodeManager#getPipeline
list.description: Returns the pipeline with id pipelineId if it exists on this node.

list.title: NodeManager#getPipelines
list.description: Returns all the pipelines associated with a node.

list.title: NodeManager#getPluginInstance
list.description: Returns the Plugin Instance identified by instanceId from the instances running on this pipeline. If no instance is found, then null is returned.

list.title: NodeManager#getPluginInstances
list.description: Returns the list of plugin instances running on this pipeline.

list.title: NodeManager#linkInstances
list.description: Links the instances provided as parameters.

list.title: NodeManager#logger
list.description: The logger handler to be used for logging messages.

list.title: NodeManager#node
list.description: The node this manager is attached to.

list.title: NodeManager#nodeName
list.description: The node name this manager is attached to.

list.title: NodeManager#pipelines
list.description: The list of open Pipelines on this node.

list.title: NodeManager#pipelinesMarkedForClosing
list.description: The list of Pipelines to be closed when commiting the pending changes.

list.title: NodeManager#removeInstanceTag
list.description: Removes a tag from the plugin instance.

list.title: NodeManager#removePluginInstance
list.description: Removes a running plugin instance from the pipeline instance list.

list.title: NodeManager#restartEdgeNode
list.description: Sends a request to restart the node.

list.title: NodeManager#setInstanceSchedule
list.description: Sets the working hours schedule for the instance. This method accepts either a detailed schedule for each day of the week or a single schedule for all days.

list.title: NodeManager#setInstanceTags
list.description: Sets the provided tags on the instance.

list.title: NodeManager#shutdownEdgeNode
list.description: Sends a request to stop the node.

list.title: NodeManager#tagInstance
list.description: Sets the value for a specific tag on the plugin instance.

list.title: NodeManager#updateInstance
list.description: Updates the config for a provided instance.

list.title: NodeManager#updatePipelineConfig
list.description: Updates the DataCaptureThread metadata for the specified pipeline.

list.title: NodeManager#updatePipelineMetadata
list.description: Updates the DataCaptureThread metadata for the specified pipeline.

list.title: NodeManager.attachPluginInstanceToPipeline
list.description: Static method that pushes a PluginInstance to a Pipeline. If the nowatch flag is set to true, this operation will not automatically append a watch on this instance in the next network request. This behavior is needed when attaching instances found on the received heartbeat, inside internal models, or when the watch is to be added manually, for supporting custom deployment mechanisms.

list.title: NodeManager.compilePipelineBatchUpdateInstances
list.description: Returns the change set list for all the plugin instances running on this pipeline.

list.title: NodeManager.compilePipelineUpdateConfig
list.description: Compiles the changeset for a given Pipeline.

list.title: NodeManager.getNodeManager
list.description: Returns an instance of a NodeManager for the requested node.

list.title: Pipeline
list.description: The Pipeline model constructor.

list.title: Pipeline#_getRawPipelineCommandPayload
list.description: Returns the Edge Node command wrapping the Pipeline command.

list.title: Pipeline#addInstanceWatch
list.description: Adds an EE_MESSAGE_PATH to watch for in the following network request.

list.title: Pipeline#client
list.description: The reference to the NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network Client.

list.title: Pipeline#dct
list.description: The Data Capture Thread used for feeding data to the pipeline.

list.title: Pipeline#getClient
list.description: Returns the NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network Client reference.

list.title: Pipeline#getDataCaptureThread
list.description: Returns the configured Data Capture Thread Model that feeds data into this pipeline.

list.title: Pipeline#getId
list.description: Returns the pipeline name/id.

list.title: Pipeline#getInitiator
list.description: Returns the id of the process that changed the pipeline last.

list.title: Pipeline#getInstanceWatches
list.description: Returns all configured EE_MESSAGE_PATHs to be watched in the following network request.

list.title: Pipeline#getMetadata
list.description: Returns the metadata set on this pipeline.

list.title: Pipeline#getNode
list.description: Returns the address of the NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network Node this pipeline runs on.

list.title: Pipeline#getType
list.description: Returns the type of the datasource feeding data into this pipeline.

list.title: Pipeline#id
list.description: The pipeline name.

list.title: Pipeline#initiator
list.description: The id of the process that changed the pipeline last.

list.title: Pipeline#instances
list.description: List of plugin instances running on this pipeline.

list.title: Pipeline#isDirty
list.description: Flag for signalling uncommitted changes to this model.

list.title: Pipeline#node
list.description: The NaeuralEdgeProtocol Edge Node on which this pipeline is running.

list.title: Pipeline#removeAllInstanceWatches
list.description: Removes all previously configured EE_MESSAGE_PATHS from the list to be watched in the following network request.

list.title: Pipeline#removeInstanceWatch
list.description: Removes a previously configured EE_MESSAGE_PATH from the list to be watched in the following network request.

list.title: Pipeline#sendCommand
list.description: Sends the provided command to the pipeline running on the NaeuralEdgeProtocol Node.

list.title: Pipeline#updateMetadata
list.description: Updates metadata set on this pipeline.

list.title: Pipeline#watches
list.description: A dictionary of paths involved in publishing messages.

list.title: Pipeline.make
list.description: Static factory for constructing Pipeline models.

list.title: PluginInstance
list.description: The PluginInstance constructor.

list.title: PluginInstance#_validateSchedule
list.description: Validates the structure and content of the schedule object. For separate schedules, ensures each key is a valid day and each value is an array of time intervals. For a single schedule for all days, ensures it's an array of time intervals. Time intervals should be in the format ["HH:MM", "HH:MM"].

list.title: PluginInstance#addTag
list.description: Adds a tag to the instance or updates an existing tag.

list.title: PluginInstance#bulkSetTags
list.description: Sets multiple tags at once, replacing any existing tags.

list.title: PluginInstance#collectorInstance
list.description: The collector instance if this instance has its results collected by another instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#compile
list.description: Puts together all the information in one config object.

list.title: PluginInstance#config
list.description: The instance config as it is on the Plugin Instance running on the NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network node.

list.title: PluginInstance#frequency
list.description: The frequency with which this instance consumes inputs from the pipeline's DCT.

list.title: PluginInstance#getCollectorInstance
list.description: Returns the path of the collecting instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#getConfig
list.description: Retrieves the running config from the PluginInstance model. The returned config will be remapped on the schema if it exists.

list.title: PluginInstance#getInstanceStats
list.description: Returns the instance running statistics.

list.title: PluginInstance#getLinkedInstances
list.description: Returns the list of collected instances.

list.title: PluginInstance#getPipelineId
list.description: Returns the id of the pipeline this plugin instance is working on.

list.title: PluginInstance#getRawInstanceCommandPayload
list.description: Returns the instance command wrapped within an NaeuralEdgeProtocol Node command.

list.title: PluginInstance#getSchedule
list.description: Retrieves the current working hours schedule of the instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#getSchema
list.description: Returns the instance's schema.

list.title: PluginInstance#getTags
list.description: Retrieves all tags from the instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#id
list.description: The instance id.

list.title: PluginInstance#isCollected
list.description: Returns true if this particular instance's output is collected by another instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#isCollecting
list.description: Returns true if this instance is the main instance, collecting and reporting output from other instances.

list.title: PluginInstance#isCollectingFrom
list.description: Returns true if this instance is collecting data from the tester instance provided.

list.title: PluginInstance#isDirty
list.description: Flag signaling that this plugin instance has changes that need to be committed to the network.

list.title: PluginInstance#isLinkable
list.description: Returns true if this plugin instance is linkable with others based on the associated schema.

list.title: PluginInstance#isLinked
list.description: Returns true if plugin instance is either collecting other instances or if its output is collected by another.

list.title: PluginInstance#link
list.description: Attempts to link this instance to the candidate instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#linkedInstances
list.description: Instances to collect results from.

list.title: PluginInstance#makeUpdateInstancePayload
list.description: Computes the instance update config by comparing the config running on the NaeuralEdgeProtocol Node with the proposed configuration stored on the instance model.

list.title: PluginInstance#outsideWorkingHours
list.description: Flag for signalling if this particular instance is outside its configured working schedule.

list.title: PluginInstance#pipeline
list.description: Handler for the pipeline model this instance is deployed on.

list.title: PluginInstance#purgeLinks
list.description: Removes all links to this instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#removeTag
list.description: Removes a tag from the instance if it exists.

list.title: PluginInstance#resetTags
list.description: Resets all tags to an empty object.

list.title: PluginInstance#schedule
list.description: The instance schedule.

list.title: PluginInstance#scheduleTimezone
list.description: The instance schedule timezone.

list.title: PluginInstance#schema
list.description: The config object schema definition.

list.title: PluginInstance#sendCommand
list.description: Sends a command to the instance running on the NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network node.

list.title: PluginInstance#setCollectorInstance
list.description: Sets this instance as collected by the provided instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#setPipeline
list.description: Sets the pipeline on which this instance is running.

list.title: PluginInstance#setSchedule
list.description: Sets the working hours schedule for the instance. This method accepts either a detailed schedule for each day of the week or a single schedule for all days.

list.title: PluginInstance#signature
list.description: The plugin signature.

list.title: PluginInstance#stats
list.description: Instance stats, including errors, error times, etc.

list.title: PluginInstance#tags
list.description: Instance tags.

list.title: PluginInstance#unlink
list.description: Removes the link between this instance and the provided linkedInstance instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#updateConfig
list.description: Method for updating the config on this instance.

list.title: PluginInstance#updateStats
list.description: Method for updating the running stats on this instance.

list.title: PluginInstance.make
list.description:
Factory method for creating new PluginInstances.

The setup object should provide a config object and a schema for proper instantiation of the PluginInstance. If the schema is provided, then this method will attempt to validate the config object based on the schema rules and throw any errors.

list.title: RedisStateManager
list.description: The RedisStateManager constructor.

list.title: RedisStateManager#_acquireLock
list.description: Attempts to acquire the lock.

list.title: RedisStateManager#_waitForLock
list.description: Waits for aquiring the lock for a specified amount of time defined by the retryInterval and number of maxRetries.

list.title: RedisStateManager#broadcastIgnoreRequestId
list.description: Signals the subscribed threads to remove the watch for a specific session id.

list.title: RedisStateManager#broadcastPayloadStickySession
list.description: Broadcast a sticky id that is to be found in the payloads. Any payload containing this session-id should be routed to this specific process.

list.title: RedisStateManager#broadcastRequestId
list.description: Broadcasts interest for a specific session id to all the subscribed threads. The session id will be used for correct routing of the received notifications from the network.

list.title: RedisStateManager#broadcastUpdateFleet
list.description: Broadcasts working fleet to all subscribed threads.

list.title: RedisStateManager#cache
list.description: The Redis handler for performing cache updates and reads.

list.title: RedisStateManager#getNetworkSnapshot
list.description: Returns the network information as received from the supervisors.

list.title: RedisStateManager#getNetworkSupervisors
list.description: Get the list of observed network supervisors.

list.title: RedisStateManager#getNodeInfo
list.description: Returns the processed heartbeat cached for a specific address.

list.title: RedisStateManager#getUniverse
list.description: Returns the list of all observed network nodes. An observed node is any of the nodes that published a payload, notification or heartbeat, which was intercepted by the worker threads, even if that message was discarded because it was not from the controlled working fleet.

list.title: RedisStateManager#inboxId
list.description: The inboxId to be read for messages received from other state managers/worker threads.

list.title: RedisStateManager#logger
list.description: Logger handler.

list.title: RedisStateManager#markNodeAsSeen
list.description: Will mark a specific node as seen in the dictionary of nodes.

list.title: RedisStateManager#markSupervisor
list.description: Store information about an observed supervisor in the cache.

list.title: RedisStateManager#nodeInfoUpdate
list.description: Stores the processed heartbeat data into the Redis cache.

list.title: RedisStateManager#pubSubChannel
list.description: The channel to subscribe to.

list.title: RedisStateManager#publishChannel
list.description: The Redis subscription channel for publishing updates to other state managers.

list.title: RedisStateManager#subscriptionChannel
list.description: The Redis subscription channel for receiving updates from other state managers.

list.title: RedisStateManager#updateNetworkSnapshot
list.description: Will store the network snapshot as seen from a specific supervisor node.

list.title: RedisStateManager._getObservedSupervisorsKeyAndLock
list.description: Returns the cache key and lock name for the list of observed network supervisors.

list.title: RedisStateManager._getRedisHeartbeatKey
list.description: Returns the cache key based on the provided node name.

list.title: RedisStateManager._getRedisUniverseAddressesKeyAndLock
list.description: Returns the cache key name and lock name for the observed universe addresses storage.

list.title: RedisStateManager._getRedisUniverseKeyAndLock
list.description: Returns the cache key name and lock name for the observed universe storage.

list.title: RedisStateManager._getSupervisorKeyAndLock
list.description: Returns the cache key and lock name for reading and updating information received from a specific supervisor.

list.title: SchemaCollection
list.description: A dictionary object holding schema configurations

list.title: SchemaDefinition
list.description: Represents the schema configuration

list.title: State
list.description: The State constructor. Will attach any needed listeners.

list.title: State#_getAddressForNode
list.description: Returns the address for a given node name. Returns null if node has not been observed.

list.title: State#broadcastPayloadStickySession
list.description: Broadcast a sticky id that is to be found in the payloads. Any payload containing this session-id should be routed to this specific process.

list.title: State#broadcastUpdateFleet
list.description: Update fleet and notify other interested parties (managed threads or other observing processes) about the update.

list.title: State#fleet
list.description: The fleet to follow.

list.title: State#getAddress
list.description: Returns the address for a given value if the value is a node name, returns the value if the value is already and address.

list.title: State#getFleet
list.description: Return the status of the controlled fleet.

list.title: State#getNetworkStatus
list.description: Returns the network as seen by the supervisor node.

list.title: State#getNetworkSupervisors
list.description: Get the list of observed supervisor nodes.

list.title: State#getNodeForAddress
list.description: Returns the node name for a given address. Returns null if address has not been observed.

list.title: State#getNodeInfo
list.description: Retrieves the cached heartbeat info.

list.title: State#getRunningInstanceConfig
list.description: Returns the configuration of a specific instance deployed on a pipeline running on the provided node.

list.title: State#getRunningPipelineConfig
list.description: Returns the configuration of a specific pipeline running on the requested node.

list.title: State#getUniverse
list.description: A method that returns all the nodes observed from the heartbeat stream with the observation timestamps.

list.title: State#logger
list.description: {Logger} logger

list.title: State#manager
list.description: The state manager to use for storing and applying state operations.

list.title: State#markAsSeen
list.description: Will mark a specific node as seen in the dictionary of nodes.

list.title: State#networkRequestsHandler
list.description: The open network transactions handler.

list.title: State#nodeInfoUpdate
list.description: Method for storing the processed heartbeat into the state.

list.title: State#onRequestResponseNotification
list.description: Pushes the received message to the transaction handler watching the message target.

list.title: State#registerMessage
list.description: Creates and configures a new transaction that will follow the completion of the request published to the network.

list.title: State#registerThread
list.description: Registers a thread into the InternalStateManager if that is the state manager loaded.

list.title: State#storeNetworkInfo
list.description: Store the network snapshot as provided by the network supervisor.

list.title: State#type
list.description: The type of manager to use. It can be either INTERNAL_STATE_MANAGER or REDIS_STATE_MANAGER.

list.title: Thread#_getAddress
list.description: Returns the address for a given value if the value is a node name, returns the value if the value is already and address.

list.title: Thread#_getAddressForNode
list.description: Returns the address for a given node name. Returns null if node has not been observed.

list.title: Thread#_getNodeForAddress
list.description: Returns the node name for a given address. Returns null if address has not been observed.

list.title: Thread#encryptCommunication
list.description: Flag for signaling if messages should be encrypted.

list.title: Thread#mainThread
list.description: The main thread connection.

list.title: Thread#mqttClient
list.description: The network connection.

list.title: Thread#naeuralBC
list.description: The NaeuralEdgeProtocol Blockchain Engine

list.title: Thread#secure
list.description: Flag for signaling if unsafe messages should be processed.

list.title: applyDefaultsToObject
list.description: Helper function that returns an object with all the missing mandatory properties based on a generic object provided. The mandatory properties are compuded based on the provided schema. All the properties added are assigned the default values from the schema definition. If no default value is provided in the schema, the property is not added to the returned object.

list.title: archiveConfigRequestStrategy
list.description: Defines the strategy to be applied when attempting to solve an ARCHIVE_CONFIG network request.

list.title: base64ToUrlSafeBase64
list.description: Helper function that replaces any URL-unsafe characters from a base64 string.

list.title: camelToNaeuralFormat
list.description:
Helper function that transforms camelCase strings into NaeuralEdgeProtocol network specific format. Conventionally, NaeuralEdgeProtocol commands have the keys in uppercase with underscore as word separator.

eg. blockchainKeyPair will be transformed as BLOCKCHAIN_KEY_PAIR

list.title: checkMandatoryFields
list.description: Helper function that tests a generic object to have all the mandatory properties populated.

list.title: checkType
list.description: Helper function for checking if a value-object is of a specific type (as defined in the schema) and if it's value complies with the allowedValues rule.

list.title: computeDifferences
list.description: Helper function that compares two generic objects and returns the modified keys from the second object when compared to the first.

list.title: convertKeysToCamelFormat
list.description: Helper function for transforming all the keys of the provided generic object into the conventional camelCase key format.

list.title: convertKeysToNaeuralFormat
list.description: Helper function for transforming all the keys of the provided generic object into the conventional NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network key format.

list.title: decode
list.description:
Helper function for unzipping a string that has been received as base64.

The reverse process can be obtained with encode(code);

list.title: defaultSchemas
list.description: The default schemas supported by the SDK.

list.title: encode
list.description:
Helper function for zipping a string and encoding the result as base64.

The output can be decoded using decode(string).

list.title: generateId
list.description: Helper function that extracts the first two groups of characters from a v4 Uuid. This function can be used for generating unique identification strings for threads, messages or other entities.

list.title: getRedisConnection
list.description: Helper function for providing Redis connection.

list.title: hasFleetFilter
list.description: This function returns true if the fleet definition is correct and is not the definition of the whole network. For processing the entire network, the fleet should be configured as [ ALL_EDGE_NODES ].

list.title: identityFormatter
list.description: The default formatter. Does not alter the received message.

list.title: isAddress
list.description: Check if value is an address or a node name.

list.title: naeuralFormatToCamel
list.description: Helper function for transforming an NaeuralEdgeProtocol Network conventional OBJECT_KEY into a camel case objectKey.

list.title: pick
list.description:
Helper function that extracts a sub-object from the provided object based on the provided path. The path string will represent each selection from the nested levels, separated by dots.

Examples:

  • name.first will attempt to return the value stored under the first key of the nested object stored at name property
  • contacts.2.email will attempt to extract the email stored under the third index of the contacts array

If no value can be found at the end of the path, the function returns undefined.

list.title: pluginDefinition
list.description: The VideoFile schema definition.

list.title: rawIn
list.description: Transforms raw messages into the default format. TODO: add link to the internal format docs.

list.title: schema
list.description: The MetaStream schema definition.

list.title: schema
list.description: The VideoFile schema definition.

list.title: schema
list.description: The VideoFile schema definition.

list.title: schema
list.description: The VideoFile schema definition.

list.title: schema
list.description: The VideoFile schema definition.

list.title: schema
list.description: The VoidStream schema definition.

list.title: sleep
list.description: Helper function that resolves a promise after a specified amount of milliseconds.

list.title: updateConfigRequestStrategy
list.description: Defines the strategy to be applied when attempting to solve an UPDATE_CONFIG network request.

list.title: updatePipelineInstanceRequestStrategy
list.description: Defines the strategy to be applied when attempting to solve an UPDATE_PIPELINE_INSTANCE or BATCH_UPDATE_PIPELINE_INSTANCE network request.

list.title: urlSafeBase64ToBase64
list.description: Helper function that reverts any replaced URL-unsafe characters in a base64 string.

list.title: validateAgainstSchema
list.description: Helper function that validates a generic object based on a received schema. Will return an array of all the validation errors, if any, empty array otherwise. This function will not check if all the mandatory keys are present, it will only test if the provided values are of the correct type and the allowedValues rule is not broken.
